chunks.title: How to Receive Tokens
chunks.body: Complete guide for receiving tokens through NYLA. Learn how to share your wallet address and verify incoming transfers.
chunks.summary_en: Step-by-step guide for receiving tokens through NYLA with wallet address sharing and verification.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过NYLA接收代币的分步指南，包括钱包地址共享和验证。

steps.action: Open NYLAGo and click Receive tab
steps.details: Navigate to NYLAGo interface and select the 'Receive' tab to access wallet address and QR code generation.
Choose the network you want to receive tokens on (Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand). Make sure sender uses the same network.
Connect your wallet (Phantom for Solana, MetaMask for Ethereum, Pera for Algorand) to display your receiving address.
Copy your wallet address from the display. This is the address senders need to send tokens to you.
Send your wallet address to the person sending you tokens. You can share via DM, email, or generate a QR code.
Watch your wallet balance and transaction history for incoming transfers. NYLA will post confirmation when transfer completes.
Check the transaction hash, amount, and sender details match what you expected to receive.

pitfalls.solution: Always verify the network matches what sender will use. Solana addresses are different from Ethereum addresses.
Ensure your wallet extension is installed, unlocked, and connected to NYLAGo.
Always use the copy button rather than manually selecting text to avoid errors.
Check blockchain explorer with your wallet address. Network congestion may delay appearance in wallet.
Confirm with sender they selected correct token. Some wallets don't display all token types by default.

prerequisites: Wallet extension installed and set up
